content: la brisa top is a very easy bottom-up pattern the front and back are identical in spain we had some severe heatwaves and my knitting life was paused for a while so i thought why don t i knit something super easy and airy for summer and this la brisa top is the result i called this la brisa breeze because that is what i need it has been so hot in barcelona i guess a lot of knitters in the world must have had the same issue so i hope you guys have some nice breeze yarn drops safran / off white 018 50 g = approx 160m 15 7 ball is used aprox 1170 metres needles 3 5mm circular needles 7 0mm circular needles size guide it is one size pattern my bust circumference is 90cm and it has approx 10cm + of positive ease happy knitting lots of love from bcn
